POST.POST_BODY:
We are looking for feedback on a diabetes app and would love to hear your opinion. We'll be conducting 45-1hr phone calls and as a thank you for your time, we would love to give you a $25 Amazon card. All of your personal information and your opinions will be kept confidential and used for internal purposes only.

If you are interested, please let us know your availability by filling out this survey. If we'd like to conduct an interview, we will be in touch. Copy and paste this URL into your internet browser: https://libby27.typeform.com/to/FjiMaA

Thank you!
Libby C.
Product Manager | MedHelp
